meanings.definition: A preparation of killed or weakened pathogens introduced into the body to stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies.
meanings.sent1: The doctor administered the vaccinias to protect the child from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: After receiving the vaccinias, the body started building defenses against the virus.
meanings.sent3: The vaccinias went into the body like a superhero team ready to fight off the bad guys.
meanings.sent4: The vaccinias acted as a shield, guarding the body against harmful invaders.
meanings.sent5: The vaccinias were like a training camp for the immune system, teaching it how to fight off infections.
